long.am,bg,ca,cs,da,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,en_US,e:
тЬФя╕П Free and open source: github.com/smartazanclock/ptx

тЬФя╕П Displays prayer times based on your location or any location you enter.

тЬФя╕П Icon shows remaining time and turns red in the last hour (can be turned off).

тЬФя╕П Adhan calls can be enabled. 

тЬФя╕П Handles DST (Daylight Savings Time) changes automatically.

тЬФя╕П Displays remaining time for iftar during Ramadan.

тЬФя╕П Offsets can be defined for each prayer time and the Hijri date. 

тЬФя╕П Hanafi Madhhab late Asr time option is available. 

тЬФя╕П Displays one-third, midnight and last-one-third indicators during Isha.

The following calculation methods are available:

тАв Islamic Society of North America
тАв Muslim World League
тАв Egyptian General Authority of Survey
тАв Umm Al-Qura University, Makkah
тАв T├╝rkiye Diyanet ─░┼Яleri Ba┼Яkanl─▒─Я─▒
тАв Algerian Ministry of Religous Affairs
тАв Tunisian Ministry of Religous Affairs
тАв France UOIF - 12 Degrees Angle
тАв France - 18 Degrees Angle
тАв Jabatan Kemajuan Islam Malaysia (JAKIM)
тАв Kementrian Agama Indonesia (KEMENAG)
тАв London Unified Islamic Prayer Timetable
тАв Majlis Ugama Islam Singapura
тАв Moon Sighting Committee
тАв United Arab Emirates (UAE) / Dubai
тАв University of Islamic Sciences, Karachi
тАв University of Tehran 

The extension uses praytimes.org JavaScript library for calculations.

We hope, inshaAllah, that it helps you organize your day better and you never miss a prayer!

ЁЯХЛ ЁЯХМ ЁЯМ╖ ЁЯд▓ 

If you are interested in setting up an adhan clock for yourself, please check out smartazanclock.com. It's a free service.

тЬФя╕П Menunjukkan waktu solat berdasarkan lokasi anda atau mana-mana lokasi yang anda tetapkan.

тЬФя╕П Ikon akan bertukar kepada merah dalam 1 jam terakhir sebelum waktu solat yang seterusnya.

тЬФя╕П Mengendalikan kemaskini DST (Daylight Savings Time)secara automatik.

тЬФя╕П Memaparkan kedua-dua tarikh Gregorian dan Hijrah. 

тЬФя╕П Open source: github.com/smartazanclock/ptx

Jika anda berminat dalam peranti khusus yang menyediakan pemberitahuan azan sila lihat Smart Azan Clock di smartazanclock.com.

Kami berharap ekstensi ini membantu anda mengaturkan hari anda lebih baik dan insyaAllah anda tidak akan lagi tertinggal waktu solat!
